about: I am a web developer specializing in WordPress and React. I build responsive, modern websites with a focus on speed, SEO, and user experience.

experience.description: Developed WordPress websites for small businesses, integrated plugins, and optimized performance.
Developed and maintained websites for private clients, including custom functionality and design.

projects.name: Services Finder (WordPress + Leaflet)
projects.description: Developed a website to locate optical companies using an interactive Leaflet map.

projects.name: Booking Calendar (FullCalendar + PHP)
projects.description: Designed and implemented a medical appointment booking system with FullCalendar

education: Self-education (courses, practice, documentation), Udemy, Google for Developers, React/WordPress documentation.
